title: Veeranna Aivalli
text: Veeranna Aivalli (<a href="Kannada">Kannada</a>: ವೀರಣ್ಣ ಐವಳ್ಳಿ) (1943-2002) was an <a href="Indian%20Police%20Service">Indian Police Service</a> officer and former commissioner of "Bureau of Civil Aviation Security", under the <a href="Ministry%20of%20Civil%20Aviation%20%28India%29">Ministry of Civil Aviation</a>, <a href="Government%20of%20India">Government of India</a>. He is widely remembered for being the Chairman of the Aviation Security Audit Programme in the <a href="International%20Civil%20Aviation%20Organization">International Civil Aviation Organization</a>, the specialized agency of the <a href="United%20Nations">United Nations</a> at <a href="Montreal%2C%20Quebec">Montreal, Quebec</a>. Aivalli also served as the <a href="Inspector%20General%20of%20Police">Inspector General of Police</a> in <a href="Jammu%20and%20Kashmir%20%28state%29">Jammu and Kashmir</a>. A debate competition by name "Veeranna Aivalli Memorial Debate" has been organized every year for university students by <a href="Indian%20Institute%20of%20Public%20Administration">Indian Institute of Public Administration</a> in J&K in his memory.
